https://tmrev.io/movie/94590-Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vXEKVaCbCUd53CYKkI0B7u1LBB6.jpg Based on the hit web series of the same name, the science fiction/adventure/comedy, Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie, follows a disgruntled gamer who must overcome his fear of the worst video game of all time in order to save his fans. Hilarity ensues as a simple road trip becomes an extravagant pursuit of the unexpected. Angry Video Game Nerd: The Movie
